plugins.name: Media embed
plugins.description: Allows for inserting embeddable media such as YouTube or Vimeo videos, Instagram posts and tweets or Google Maps into your rich-text content.

htmlOutput._comment: If `config.mediaEmbed.previewsInData` is turned off, the media preview is not displayed and media is represented using only the `<oembed>` tag (by default).
If `config.mediaEmbed.previewsInData` is turned on, the media preview is displayed in the view.
If preview configuration `config.mediaEmbed.previewsInData` is turned off, plugin can be configured to return any element name using `config.mediaEmbed.elementName`.
Plugin can be configured to return any class, inline style, attribute and element name via `config.mediaEmbed.providers` for previewable media.

plugins.name: Media embed toolbar
plugins.description: Implements an optional toolbar for media embed that shows up when the media element is selected.
